name: Destiny Road
description:
Destiny Road is a Platformer Puzzle in 3 dimensions, the objective of the game is to overcome all the levels, collecting all the items, before time runs out.

History:

A 10 year old boy named Kai is trapped in a mysterious place known as W. World, the one who has locked him in this place is a living puppet for no apparent reason. Kai must make his way towards the evil puppet to find a way out.

this is a prototype of the 1st level.
(My inspiration for the level, were the special stages of the Sonic CD game)
